topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559617c7636872434c001bb1#post_559617c7636872434c001bb1
Not only that, it was structured better as a narrative. Mulan's struggle to find her identity was endearing yes but there were so many things that were just out of place. Mushu being one of them. Now don't get me wrong I love Mushu but it feels like he came out of a completely different movie. If they just cut the dragon and the ancestors all out and just made it about Mulan herself Mulan would have been MUUUUCH better. Not to mention the sheer amount of lazy writing in Mulan. The burning village scene is the biggest offender of that.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55961ae563687215f10005a7#post_55961ae563687215f10005a7
For me.

The Tigger movie. Because it was really touching on how sometimes you just feel like you are alone.

Treasure Planet. I loooove the story and characters and Animation! It was a great Film!

 Robin Hood (Disney). Because well obviously cute animal critters.

Toy Story. So many great moments. I remember watching Toy Story 2 on VHS as a kid constantly.

Hercules. Mother Fucking Hades bitch!

Aladin. Had such good music!

Tarzan. Fucking TARZAN!

*BUZZ LIGHTYEAR*. FUCKING INFINITY AND BEYOND!

There are a lot more I'm leaving out cuz I cant remember the names at the moment.
